reusable.name: Log In To Banner
reusable.step: I am on "MD_COMMON_LINKS_BPPBANNERURL" URL
I click on the "Banner Application Navigator" link
I fill the "Banner Username" field with "MD_COMMON_CREDENTIALS_BPPBANNERUSER"
I fill the "Banner Password" field with "MD_COMMON_CREDENTIALS_BPPBANNERPASSWORD"
I click on the "Banner Login" button
I should see the "Banner User Menu Icon" element

reusable.name: Navigate To Form
reusable.step: I fill the "Banner Go To Form" field with "SAADCRV"
I press "MD_COMMON_KEYBOARD_ENTER" for "Banner Go To Form"

reusable.name: Register New Student Account
reusable.step: I am on "MD_COMMON_LINKS_BUILDEMPIREURL" URL
I click on the "Direct App Register Link on Login Page" button
I remember "Auto<KW_AUTO_FIRSTNAME>" text as "EC_FIRSTNAME" variable
I set "EC_FIRSTNAME" text to the "First name" "Build Empire text field"
I remember "Auto<KW_AUTO_LASTNAME>" text as "EC_LASTNAME" variable
I set "EC_LASTNAME" text to the "Surname" "Build Empire text field"
I remember "Auto1<KW_AUTO_FIRSTNAME>/@/harakirimail.com" text as "EC_EMAIL_ADDRESS" variable
I set "EC_EMAIL_ADDRESS" text to the "Email" "Build Empire text field"
I remember "0913<KW_AUTO_RANDOMNUMBER|#######>" text as "EC_PHONENUMBER" variable
I set "EC_PHONENUMBER" text to the "Telephone number" "Build Empire text field"
I remember "A@polloGlobal2018" text as "EC_PASSWORD" variable
I set "EC_PASSWORD" text to the "Password" "Build Empire text field"
I click on the "Direct App I Am Happy To Receive Information" button
I click on the "Direct App Register" button

reusable.name: Log In to Hub as Student
reusable.step: I am on "MD_COMMON_LINKS_BUILDEMPIREURL" URL
I set "EC_EMAIL_ADDRESS" text to the "Email" "Build Empire text field"
I set "EC_PASSWORD" text to the "Password" "Build Empire text field"
I click on the "Direct App Login Button" button

reusable.name: Log In to Hub as Admin
reusable.step: I am on "MD_COMMON_LINKS_BUILDEMPIREADMINURL" URL
I fill the "Direct App Admin Email" field with "MD_COMMON_CREDENTIALS_BUILDEMPIRENEILADMINUSER"
I fill the "Direct App Admin Password" field with "MD_COMMON_CREDENTIALS_BUILDEMPIRENEILADMINPASSWORD"
I click on the "Direct App Login Button" button

reusable.name: Log In
reusable.step: I am on "MD_COMMON_LINKS_PRODUCTFACTORYURL" URL
I click on the "Sign in with Auth0" button
I fill the "Product Factory Email" field with "MD_COMMON_CREDENTIALS_PRODUCTFACTORYUSER"
I fill the "Product Factory Password" field with "MD_COMMON_CREDENTIALS_PRODUCTFACTORYPASSWORD"
I click on the "Product Factory Login" button

reusable.name: Create Body Financial Dimension
reusable.step: I click on the "Financials" "Product Factory navigation item"
I click on the "Financial Dimensions" "Product Factory navigation sub item"
I click on the "Create" "Product Factory button"
I set "BodyFDCode[####]" text to the "Code" "Product Factory text field"
I set "BodyFDDescription[####]" text to the "Description" "Product Factory text field"
I click on the "Applies To" "Product Factory dropdown"
I click on the "Body" "Product Factory dropdown option"
I click on the "Save" "Product Factory button"
I should see the "EC_BODY_FD_CODE" element

reusable.name: Create Location Financial Dimension
reusable.step: I click on the "Financials" "Product Factory navigation item"
I click on the "Financial Dimensions" "Product Factory navigation sub item"
I click on the "Create" "Product Factory button"
I set "LocationFDCode[####]" text to the "Code" "Product Factory text field"
I set "LocationFDDescription[####]" text to the "Description" "Product Factory text field"
I click on the "Applies To" "Product Factory dropdown"
I click on the "Location" "Product Factory dropdown option"
I click on the "Save" "Product Factory button"
I should see the "EC_LOCATION_FD_CODE" element

reusable.name: Create Region Financial Dimension
reusable.step: I click on the "Financials" "Product Factory navigation item"
I click on the "Financial Dimensions" "Product Factory navigation sub item"
I click on the "Create" "Product Factory button"
I set "RegionFDCode[####]" text to the "Code" "Product Factory text field"
I set "RegionFDDescription[####]" text to the "Description" "Product Factory text field"
I click on the "Applies To" "Product Factory dropdown"
I click on the "Region" "Product Factory dropdown option"
I click on the "Save" "Product Factory button"
I should see the "EC_REGION_FD_CODE" element

reusable.name: Create Course Type Financial Dimension
reusable.step: I click on the "Financials" "Product Factory navigation item"
I click on the "Financial Dimensions" "Product Factory navigation sub item"
I click on the "Create" "Product Factory button"
I set "CourseTypeFDCode[####]" text to the "Code" "Product Factory text field"
I set "CourseTypeFDDescription[####]" text to the "Description" "Product Factory text field"
I click on the "Applies To" "Product Factory dropdown"
I click on the "Course Type" "Product Factory dropdown option"
I click on the "Save" "Product Factory button"
I should see the "EC_COURSE_TYPE_FD_CODE" element

reusable.name: Create Material Type Financial Dimension
reusable.step: I click on the "Financials" "Product Factory navigation item"
I click on the "Financial Dimensions" "Product Factory navigation sub item"
I click on the "Create" "Product Factory button"
I set "MaterialTypeFDCode[####]" text to the "Code" "Product Factory text field"
I set "MaterialTypeFDDescription[####]" text to the "Description" "Product Factory text field"
I click on the "Applies To" "Product Factory dropdown"
I click on the "Material Type" "Product Factory dropdown option"
I click on the "Save" "Product Factory button"
I should see the "EC_MATERIAL_TYPE_FD_CODE" element

reusable.name: Create Body
reusable.step: I click on the "Programme" "Product Factory navigation item"
I click on the "Bodies" "Product Factory navigation sub item"
I click on the "Create" "Product Factory button"
I set "BodyShortName[####]" text to the "Short Name" "Product Factory text field"
I set "BodyName[####]" text to the "Name" "Product Factory text field"
I click on the "Change" "button"
I click on the "EC_BODY_FD_CODE" "Product Factory change modal option"
I click on the "Save" "Product Factory button"
I should see the "EC_BODY_SHORT_NAME" element

reusable.name: Create Level
reusable.step: I click on the "Programme" "Product Factory navigation item"
I click on the "Levels" "Product Factory navigation sub item"
I click on the "Create" "Product Factory button"
I set "LevelShortName[####]" text to the "Short Name" "Product Factory text field"
I set "LevelName[####]" text to the "Name" "Product Factory text field"
I click on the "Save" "Product Factory button"
I should see the "EC_LEVEL_SHORT_NAME" element

reusable.name: Create Paper
reusable.step: I click on the "Programme" "Product Factory navigation item"
I click on the "Papers" "Product Factory navigation sub item"
I click on the "Create" "Product Factory button"
I set "PaperDescription[####]" text to the "Description" "Product Factory text field"
I click on the "Save" "Product Factory button"
I should see the "EC_PAPER_DESCRIPTION" element

reusable.name: Link Body To Paper
reusable.step: I click on the "Programme" "Product Factory navigation item"
I click on the "Papers" "Product Factory navigation sub item"
I click on the "EC_PAPER_DESCRIPTION" "Product Factory Change Body button"
I click on the "EC_BODY_NAME" "Product Factory select button"
I click on the "Yes" "button"

reusable.name: Create Sitting
reusable.step: I click on the "Delivery" "Product Factory navigation item"
I click on the "Sittings" "Product Factory navigation sub item"
I click on the "Create" "Product Factory button"
I set "SittingName[####]" text to the "Name" "Product Factory text field"
I remember "KW_AUTO_TODAY|DD/MM/YYYY" text as "EC_SITTING_START_DATE" variable
I set "EC_SITTING_START_DATE" text to the "Start Date" "Product Factory text field"
I remember "10/10/2020" text as "EC_SITTING_END_DATE" variable
I set "EC_SITTING_END_DATE" text to the "End Date" "Product Factory text field"
I "check" "EC_BODY_NAME" "Product Factory dialog checkbox"
I click on the "Save" "Product Factory button"
I should see the "EC_SITTING_NAME" element

reusable.name: Create Location
reusable.step: I click on the "Delivery" "Product Factory navigation item"
I click on the "Locations" "Product Factory navigation sub item"
I click on the "Create" "Product Factory button"
I set "LocationName[####]" text to the "Name" "Product Factory text field"
I set "LocationAddress[####]" text to the "Address" "Product Factory text field"
I click on the "Region" "Product Factory dropdown"
I click on the "EC_REGION_NAME" "Product Factory dropdown option"
I click on the "Financial Dimension" "Product Factory dropdown"
I click on the "EC_LOCATION_FD_DESCRIPTION" "Product Factory dropdown option"
I click on the "Save" "Product Factory button"
I should see the "EC_LOCATION_NAME" element

reusable.name: Create Region
reusable.step: I click on the "Delivery" "Product Factory navigation item"
I click on the "Region" "Product Factory navigation sub item"
I click on the "Create" "Product Factory button"
I set "RegionName[####]" text to the "Name" "Product Factory text field"
I click on the "Financial Dimension" "Product Factory dropdown"
I click on the "EC_REGION_FD_DESCRIPTION" "Product Factory dropdown option"
I click on the "Save" "Product Factory button"
I should see the "EC_REGION_NAME" element

reusable.name: Create Course Type
reusable.step: I click on the "Types" "Product Factory navigation item"
I click on the "Course Types" "Product Factory navigation sub item"
I click on the "Create" "Product Factory button"
I set "CourseTypeDescription[####]" text to the "Description" "Product Factory text field"
I click on the "VAT Rule" "Product Factory change button"
I click on the "EC_VAT_RULE_CODE" "Product Factory select button"
I click on the "Cost Centre Financial Dimension" "Product Factory change button"
I click on the "EC_COURSE_TYPE_FD_CODE" "Product Factory select button"
I click on the "Project Financial Dimension" "Product Factory change button"
I click on the "EC_COURSE_TYPE_FD_CODE" "Product Factory select button"
I click on the "Save" "Product Factory button"
I should see the "EC_COURSE_TYPE_DESCRIPTION" element

reusable.name: Create Client
reusable.step: I click on the "Miscellaneous" "Product Factory navigation item"
I click on the "Clients" "Product Factory navigation sub item"
I click on the "Create" "Product Factory button"
I set "ClientName[####]" text to the "Name" "Product Factory text field"
I click on the "Save" "Product Factory button"
I should see the "EC_CLIENT_NAME" element

reusable.name: Create Pricing Matrix
reusable.step: I click on the "Financials" "Product Factory navigation item"
I click on the "Prices" "Product Factory navigation sub item"
I click on the "Create" "Product Factory button"
I click on the "Body" "Product Factory change button"
I click on the "EC_BODY_NAME" "Product Factory change modal option"
I click on the "Sitting" "Product Factory change button"
I click on the "EC_SITTING_NAME" "Product Factory change modal option"
I click on the "Save" "Product Factory button"
I should see the "EC_BODY_NAME" element

reusable.name: Create VAT Rule
reusable.step: I click on the "Financials" "Product Factory navigation item"
I click on the "VAT Rules" "Product Factory navigation sub item"
I click on the "Create" "Product Factory button"
I set "VatRuleCode[####]" text to the "Code" "Product Factory text field"
I set "VatRuleDescription[####]" text to the "Description" "Product Factory text field"
I click on the "Save" "Product Factory button"
I should see the "EC_VAT_RULE_CODE" element

reusable.name: Link Body To Level
reusable.step: I click on the "Programme" "Product Factory navigation item"
I click on the "Bodies" "Product Factory navigation sub item"
I click on the "EC_BODY_NAME" "Product Factory Link Levels button"
I "check" "EC_LEVEL_NAME" "Product Factory dialog checkbox"
I click on the "Save" "Product Factory button"

reusable.name: Link Body To Level
reusable.step: I click on the "EC_PAPER_DESCRIPTION" "Product Factory Change Body button"
I click on the "EC_BODY_NAME" "Product Factory select button"
I click on the "Yes" "button"

reusable.name: Log In To Salesforce
reusable.step: I am on "MD_COMMON_LINKS_SALESFORCEURL" URL
I fill the "Salesforce Username" field with "MD_COMMON_CREDENTIALS_BPPADMINUSER"
I fill the "Salesforce Password" field with "MD_COMMON_CREDENTIALS_BPPADMINPASSWORD"
I click on the "Salesforce Login" button
I should see the "Salesforce Context Bar Menu" element

reusable.name: Log Out Salesforce
reusable.step: I click on the "Salesforce User Menu Icon" button
I click on the "Salesforce Log Out" button
